verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, to <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>, whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> I have <S%H2388>holden<s%>, to <S%H7286>subdue<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6605>him<s%>, and I will loose the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>; to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1817>him<s%>, and the gates shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%>:

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3474>thee<s%>, and make the rough <S%H1921>places<s%> <S%H3474>smooth<s%>; I will break in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%>, and cut in <S%H1438>sunder<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>;

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and hidden <S%H4301>riches<s%> of secret <S%H4565>places<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> that it is <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, who <S%H7121>call<s%> thee by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, even the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3478>sake<s%>, and Israel my <S%H972>chosen<s%>, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> thee by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: I have <S%H3655>surnamed<s%> <S%H3045>thee<s%>, though thou hast not known me.
I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and there is none <S%H2108>else<s%>; besides me there is no <S%H430>God<s%>. I will <S%H247>gird<s%> <S%H3045>thee<s%>, though thou hast not known me;

that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, that there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>: I am Jehovah, and there is none else.

I <S%H3335>form<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; I <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>. I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that doeth all these <S%H6213>things<s%>.

Distil <S%H7491><s%>, ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, from <S%H4605>above<s%>, and let the <S%H7834>skies<s%> pour <S%H5140>down<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%>, that it may bring <S%H6509>forth<s%> <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and let it cause <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have created <S%H1254>it<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that <S%H7378>striveth<s%> with his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>! a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> among the <S%H2789>potsherds<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>! Shall the <S%H2563>clay<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him that <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, What makest <S%H6467>thou<s%>? or thy work, He hath no <S%H3027>hands<s%>?
Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that <S%H559>saith<s%> unto a <S%H1>father<s%>, What <S%H3205>begettest<s%> <S%H802>thou<s%>? or to a woman, With what travailest <S%H2342>thou<s%>?

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> me of the things that are to <S%H857>come<s%>; concerning my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and concerning the <S%H6467>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%>, command ye <S%H6680>me<s%>.

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon <S%H3027>it<s%>: I, even my hands, have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and all their <S%H6635>host<s%> have I <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

I have raised him <S%H5782>up<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and I will make <S%H3474>straight<s%> all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>: he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H5892>city<s%>, and he shall let my <S%H1546>exiles<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H4242>free<s%>, not for price nor <S%H7810>reward<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, The <S%H3018>labor<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>, and the <S%H5436>Sabeans<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4060>stature<s%>, shall come <S%H5674>over<s%> unto <S%H3212>thee<s%>, and they shall be thine: they shall go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2131>thee<s%>, in chains they shall come <S%H5674>over<s%>; and they shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> unto <S%H6419>thee<s%>, they shall make supplication unto <S%H410>thee<s%>, saying, Surely God is in <S%H657>thee<s%>; and there is none else, there is no <S%H430>God<s%>.
Verily <S%H403><s%> thou art a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5641>hidest<s%> <S%H430>thyself<s%>, O God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>.

They shall be put to <S%H3637>shame<s%>, <S%H954>yea<s%>, confounded, all of <S%H1980>them<s%>; they shall go into <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that are <S%H2796>makers<s%> of <S%H6736>idols<s%>.

But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> by <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: ye shall not be put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> nor <S%H954>confounded<s%> <S%H5769>world<s%> without <S%H5703>end<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3559>it<s%>, that established it and <S%H1254>created<s%> it not a <S%H8414>waste<s%>, that <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and there is none else.

I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, in a <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; I <S%H559>said<s%> not unto the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H1245>Seek<s%> ye me in <S%H8414>vain<s%>: <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, I <S%H5046>declare<s%> things that are <S%H4339>right<s%>.

Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves and <S%H935>come<s%>; draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, ye that are <S%H6412>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: they have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> that <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of their graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto a <S%H410>god<s%> that cannot <S%H3467>save<s%>.

Declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H5066>ye<s%>, and bring it forth; <S%H3289>yea<s%>, let them take counsel <S%H3162>together<s%>: who hath <S%H5046>showed<s%> this from ancient <S%H6924>time<s%>? who hath <S%H5046>declared<s%> it of <S%H3068>old<s%>? have not I, Jehovah? and there is no <S%H430>God<s%> else <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H6662>me<s%>, a just <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>; there is <S%H369>none<s%> besides <S%H2108>me<s%>.
Look <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H3467>me<s%>, and be ye saved, all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and there is none else.

By myself have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> from my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, that unto me every <S%H1290>knee<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%>, every <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

Only in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, it is <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H6666>me<s%>, is righteousness and <S%H5797>strength<s%>; even to him shall men <S%H935>come<s%>; and all they that were <S%H2734>incensed<s%> against him shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
In <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>, and shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>.
